title: Delete ACL Entry
description: Delete subject associated with object specified by UUID.
name: DeleteAppAclRefuuid

title: Get ACL Entries
description: Get all entries associated with object specified by UUID.
name: GetAppAclRefuuid

title: Add ACL Entry
description: Add subject pairing to object specified by UUID.
name: PostAppAclRefuuid

title: Delete User Role
description: Remove a directly assigned role from the specified user.
name: DeleteAppKeycloakUsersUserRoles

title: Get User Groups
description: Get a list of groups specified user belongs to.
name: GetAppKeycloakUsersUserGroups

title: Get User Roles
description: Get a list of roles the user has assigned.

Success 200.description: role source, either "assigned" or the name of group who delegates the role.

name: GetAppKeycloakUsersUserRoles

title: Add User Role
description: Directly assign a role to specified user.
name: PostAppKeycloakUsersUserRoles

title: Clear Labels
description: Delete all labels owned by specified user.
name: DeleteAppLabelUsernameClearall

title: Delete Label
description: Delete identified label owned by specified user.
name: DeleteAppLabelUsernameDeleteIdentifier

description: Get a list of labels belonging to the specified user.
name: GetAppLabelUser

Parameter.description: logging level, one of the following: TRACE, DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR

title: Check Status
description: Retrieve full status of specified service instance.

Success 200.description: Instance status composite, containing both superstate and substate

name: GetAppServiceSiuuidStatus
